PathOfBuilding.Notes:
plans:
- large cluster 3 notables - sadist + prismatic heart in front = need disorienting or doryani as suffix - minions: - need colors + corpses - pale seraphim, dark marionette (scorch), - animate guardian: - -fire res helmet / eye of malice ?? - curse gloves+boots? - grutkul regen - - annoint: +1 curse - balance of terror + ele weakness - auras: - aspect of spider on ring - malevolence - blessing hatred
